formElement.documentation: ID or name of the team project.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: ID or name of the team project.
formElement.label: Project name:

formElement.documentation: ID or name of the repository.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: ID or name of the repository.
formElement.label: Repository name:

formElement.documentation: Path to the item in the repository. e.g. /WebSite/WebSite/Views/Home/_Home.cshtml.
formElement.label: File path:

formElement.documentation: Destination folder for file. If not specified, defaults to the current job workspace.
formElement.label: Destination folder for file:

formElement.documentation: Specify the format for dowloading an artifact.
formElement.label: Download format:

formElement.documentation: Use true to include additional metadata about the item content, like the file type. Useful only when metadata is retrived.
formElement.label: Include content metadata:

formElement.documentation: true gets the commit that contains the previous change to the retrieved version of the item. Of course, the root item ("/") has no commits associated with it, so there will not be a commit returned with the root item. Useful only when metadata is retrived.
formElement.label: Latest processed change:

formElement.documentation: Use the versionType and version parameters together. For example, to get an item from "mybranch", use versionType=branch and version=mybranch.
formElement.label: Version type:

formElement.htmlDocumentation:
If versionType is...Version is interpreted as...
BranchThe name of a branch.
TagThe name of a tag.
CommitThe ID of a commit.
You can also modify the version with the versionOptions parameter.
formElement.label: Version:

formElement.htmlDocumentation:
First parent: The parent branch to the version specified by the versionType and version parameters.
Previous change: The last version of the item that was changed prior to the version specified by the versionType and version parameters.
None: No modification to the version specified by the versionType and version parameters.
formElement.label: Version options:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Property sheet name for results:
